Package com.dougnoel.sentinel.webdrivers

Class WebDriverFactory

java.lang.Object
com.dougnoel.sentinel.webdrivers.WebDriverFactory
public class WebDriverFactory extends Object
This object factory is used to keep up with driver versions for all browsers. For a list of supported browsers and operating systems, see the readme.

  • Method Details

    • instantiateWebDriver

      protected static org.openqa.selenium.WebDriver instantiateWebDriver()
      Creates and returns a useable WebDriver. We use this factory method to handle keeping up with driver versions for all browsers. The browser can be set in the config file or a system variable. See the README for more information.
      Returns:
      WebDriver An initialized Selenium WebDriver object for the specified browser and operating system combination.

    • getWebDriver

      public static org.openqa.selenium.WebDriver getWebDriver()
      Returns the WebDriver instance. This will silently instantiate the WebDriver if that has not been done yet.
      Returns:
      WebDriver the created Selenium WebDriver

    • quit

      protected static void quit()
      Quits the driver and sets the driver instance back to null.

    • exists

      public static boolean exists()

    • setChromeDownloadDirectory

      private static org.openqa.selenium.chrome.ChromeOptions setChromeDownloadDirectory(org.openqa.selenium.chrome.ChromeOptions options)
      Sets the download directory for chromedriver. Cannot be used with Saucelabs.
      Parameters:
      options - ChromeOptions object to set

    • createChromeDriver

      private static org.openqa.selenium.WebDriver createChromeDriver()
      Creates a ChromeDriver. Makes it headless if the -Dheadless flag is set. Can pass additional arguments with the -DchromeOptions flag, such as -DchromeOptions="start-maximized" to open all browser windows maximized.
      Returns:
      WebDriver ChromeDrvier
